instructions: This is NOT a diagnosis. It’s a reflective quiz inspired by common autism questionnaires, for fun only.

interpretation.37-40: Super strong autism vibes — but remember, this is just for fun!

questions.text: I prefer routines and feel stressed when plans suddenly change.
I sometimes miss social cues, like sarcasm or hints.
I can spend hours diving into my special interests without getting bored.
I find small talk awkward or tiring.
Bright lights, loud noises, or strong textures can overwhelm me.
I’d rather text or type than talk face-to-face.
I enjoy organizing, categorizing, or collecting things.
I often notice tiny details that others don’t.
I sometimes repeat phrases, movements, or sounds when stressed.
I find making or keeping friends harder than others seem to.
